Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets are 11-4 on their home court.
The Heat are 6-9 on the road.
The Rockets are shooting 44.4% from the field this season, 1.8 percentage points lower than the 46.2% the Heat allow to opponents.
The Heat average 14.5 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.3 more made shots on average than the 12.2 per game the Rockets allow.
Alperen Sengun is averaging 19 points, 10.6 rebounds, and 5.1 assists for the Rockets.
Tyler Herro is scoring 23.9 points per game and averaging 5.7 rebounds for the Heat.
Rockets: Dillon Brooks: day to day (ankle), Tari Eason: day to day (rest).
Heat: Dru Smith: out for season (achilles), Josh Richardson: day to day (heel), Jimmy Butler: day to day (illness).
Miscellaneous Highlights: BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Rockets -6.5; over/under is 216.5
The Miami Heat take on the Houston Rockets in a non-conference matchup.
